short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be reminded of upcoming birthdays and anniversaries 7-days in advance. All data stored locally. No sign-in required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find it difficult remembering important events like birthdays and anniversaries, even though the dates are on your calendar or phone? 

Do you often find yourself sending belated birthday wishes? Are you tired of hearing "Hey, you forgot my birthday!" or "Do you even know what day it is?!"

I had the same problem, so I decided to create Remembrance.

Remembrance is a free, simple Chrome extension that helps you NOT miss important events! It's simple; open a new tab to view all upcoming events at a glance.

Have a busy schedule or just way too many friends? Get reminders for each birthday or anniversary with every new tab. 

And because Remembrance gives you a heads up 7 days ahead of time, figuring out what to gift your loved one (and actually have time to wrap it) has never been easier.
